data.title: Visiting the Zenith Aircraft Company kit production facilities in Mexico, Missouri, USA (MYJ)
data.text:
VISITING THE FACTORY

Visiting the Zenith Aircraft Company kit production facilities in Mexico, Missouri

What better way to learn more about Zenith Aircraft Company's kit planes than by actually visiting the factory where the kits are made? Factory demonstrator kit aircraft are available for demonstration flights to potential builders and scheduled factory workshops allow potential builders to gain hands-on experience in building a kit aircraft. Demo flights are available strictly by appointment, weather permitting, and are to demonstrate to potential builders the normal operating envelope and characteristics of the aircraft.

Click here to download the Google Earth Placemark for Zenith Aircraft Company.

APPOINTMENT: Before making travel arrangements to visit the factory, please make an appointment, and schedule appointments during our regular business operating hours (8 AM - 5 PM, Monday - Friday). Call (573) 581-9000 to schedule a factory appointment.

ACCOMMODATIONS: Area Lodging: Request the Zenith corporate rate when making your reservation.

Best Western Teal Lake Inn: 573-582-0700; 800-780-7234 ** Request Zenith Corporate Rate **

(Indoor Pool, Health/Fitness Center On-Site) Directions

Columbia, Missouri (40 miles SW of Mexico) is home to the University of Missouri and offers many hotels and restaurants.

AirNav (plan your stops for your flight to Mexico, MO)

If flying in by commercial airline, we recommend that you fly in to St. Louis (STL) and rent a car for the duration of your visit. The St. Louis airport is an easy 2 hour drive. Directions

Also, check for flights into Columbia, Missouri (COU). This is a regional airport with several scheduled flights per day, about a 45 minute drive to Zenith. Directions
